creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Barbed rim with foliate form; lobed sides on inner and outer rims carved with birds and flowers in black against a red ground; central area carved with two buildings in a landscape; deer and stork in lower foreground; 3 figures in a building at L; 8 figures at center, including a man on a horse and a man playing the flute
markings: Untranslated inscription, in red, on bottom
title: Dish
